description:
Our vision parallels the district vision, which is to maintain an unwavering focus on powerful and engaging learning experiences that prepare students for college, career, and life success. 

To achieve this vision, the community of Foothill Oaks Elementary School will commit to:
 
Nurturing responsible citizens
Fostering a passion for higher learning
Creating an inclusive environment where diversity is celebrated
Ensuring a positive and safe learning environment for all students 
Our students and staff at Foothill Oaks Elementary share a strong desire to be the best we can be. Our student population is diverse and ranges from transitional kindergarten to sixth grade, and we are fortunate to have four moderate-severe SDC classes, K - 6.
